translations.SPLASH_EXTRA_REVEALS_TEXT:
Find 3 or more Platinum Coins
 to unlock extra reveals!
translations.SPLASH_COIN_COLLECTOR_TEXT:
Find Gold Coins during
 extra reveals to win big!
translations.SPLASH_BONUS_TEXT2:
Find Gold Coins during
extra reveals to win big!
translations.SPLASH_BONUS_TEXT1:
Find 3 or more Platinum Coins
to unlock extra reveals!
translations.BONUS_INFO_POP_UP_TEXT1: To reveal the game click PLAY.
translations.BONUS_INFO_POP_UP_TEXT2:
If any of the numbers on YOUR TICKETS match the WINNING NUMBERS,
win the prize shown on that ticket.
translations.BONUS_INFO_POP_UP_TEXT3: Find a stack of coins to increase the prize on the prize meter.
translations.BONUS_INFO_POP_UP_TEXT4:
When no reveals remain, win the prize reached on the prize meter
and return to the main game.
translations.INFO_POP_UP6: If any of the numbers on YOUR TICKETS match the WINNING NUMBERS, win the prize shown on that ticket.
translations.INFO_POP_UP7: Find 3,4, or 5 COINS to unlock the Extra Reveals Bonus!
translations.INFO_POP_UP4: To purchase the game, click PLAY or press the spacebar.
translations.INFO_POP_UP5: To play the game, click REVEAL ALL or click each ticket manually.
translations.INFO_POP_UP3:
Your total cost equals the number of tickets multiplied 
by the ticket cost.
translations.INFO_POP_UP_GAME_RULES_TEXT: For more details about the game, refer to the [Game Rules]
